sources.title: Hard Guy
sources.description: Another film from Producers Releasing Corporation.

sources.title: Hard Guy (1941) CRIME-DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Jack La Rue, Mary Healy and Kane Richmond
Director: Elmer Clifton

Vic is a night club owner/racketeer whose club is run primarily for the purpose of the club girls marrying the rich blue bloods among the customers, leading to annulments leading to cash settlements and/or blackmail.

metadata.Plot: Vic is a night club owner/racketeer whose club is run primarily for the purpose of the club girls marrying the rich blue bloods among the customers, leading to annulments leading to cash settlements and/or blackmail.
metadata.Actors: Jack La Rue, Mary Healy, Kane Richmond
